bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with gui zhu 鬼疰 , demon attachment-illness. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry bai jie 白芥：子，主射工及疰氣 , “The seeds control the archer [bug’s poison] and attachment-illness qi ”.

② Etiological Agent. of a turbid qi issued by demonic beings or encountered on burial grounds and in mountain forests that is capable of bringing forth demon attachment-illness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 1: 江南度世丸，治萬病癥結積聚，伏屍長病，寒熱疰氣流行皮 中 , “The ‘pills from South of the Yangzi transcending ages’ cure a myriad of diseases of concretion-illness nodes, accumulations and collections, as well as chronic hidden corpse [qi] disease, alternating sensations of cold and heat, and attachment-illness qi flowing in the skin”.
